menu.background_mode_msg:
App will enter background mode

‚Ä¢ Bird ID service continues running
‚Ä¢ Lightroom plugin works normally
‚Ä¢ Reopen app to restore interface

Note: Server uses ~250MB memory

dialogs.file_organization_msg:
After analysis, photos will be organized into folders:

‚Ä¢ 1-Star ‚Üí 1star_average

post_adjustment.title: Post Adjustment - Optimize Rating Criteria

settings.thresholds_desc: Minimum thresholds for technical quality. Photos below these values get 0 stars.
settings.reset_confirm_msg: Reset all settings to default values?
settings.reset_done_msg: All settings have been reset to defaults.
settings.save_success_msg:
Settings saved successfully.
Language changes require restart.
settings.exposure_desc: Photos with overexposed/underexposed ratio above this threshold will be downgraded by 1 star

advanced_settings.title: Settings
advanced_settings.detection_sensitivity_hint: Lower is more sensitive, easier to detect birds
advanced_settings.sharpness_requirement_hint: Higher is stricter, keeps only the sharpest photos
advanced_settings.aesthetics_requirement_hint: Higher is stricter, keeps only well-composed photos
advanced_settings.birdid_confidence_hint: Higher is more accurate, but may miss some species
advanced_settings.confirm_reset_msg: Reset all settings to default values?
advanced_settings.reset_done_msg: All settings have been reset to defaults.
advanced_settings.save_error_msg: Failed to save settings. Please check permissions.
advanced_settings.zero_star_thresholds: 0 Star Rating Thresholds (Affects Technical Quality Judgment)
advanced_settings.rating_tab_description: Adjust hardcoded rating thresholds (affects 0-star judgment, -1 star only for no bird)
advanced_settings.output_tab_description: Configure output and logging related settings
advanced_settings.min_confidence_description: Below this value will be rated 0-star (poor technical quality)
advanced_settings.min_sharpness_description: Below this value will be rated 0-star (poor technical quality)
advanced_settings.min_nima_description: Below this value will be rated 0-star (poor technical quality)
advanced_settings.max_brisque_description: Above this value will be rated 0-star (poor technical quality)
advanced_settings.picked_percentage_description: Among 3-star photos, those ranking in top % for both aesthetic and sharpness will be picked
advanced_settings.csv_description: CSV contains detailed rating data for all photos (required for post adjustment feature)
advanced_settings.log_detailed_label: Detailed - Show rating details for each photo
advanced_settings.log_simple_label: Simple - Only show progress and statistics

tooltips.ai_confidence: AI bird detection confidence threshold, photos below this won't be processed
tooltips.sharpness: Photo sharpness threshold, affects 2-star and 3-star ratings
tooltips.nima: NIMA aesthetic score threshold, affects 2-star and 3-star ratings
tooltips.normalization: Sharpness normalization method, affects fairness between large and small birds

help.welcome_title: Welcome to SuperPicky V4.0.3 - AI-Powered Bird Photo Selector
help.step1: Click 'Browse' to select photo directory (supports RAW/JPG)
help.step2: Adjust 3-star and pick flag parameters (optional, defaults recommended)
help.step3: Click 'Start Processing' and wait for AI analysis to complete
help.step4: Import to Lightroom for post-processing and management
help.rule_3_star: ‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê = Both sharpness and aesthetics meet threshold (3 stars)
help.rule_picked: ‚îî‚îÄ üèÜ Pick Flag = Top {percentage}% in both aesthetics and sharpness among 3-star photos
help.rule_flying: üü¢ Green Label = Flying pose bird (Sharpness √ó1.2 bonus)
help.rule_focus: üî¥ Red Label = Precise Focus (focus on head) (Sharpness √ó1.1 bonus)
help.burst_info: üì∏ Burst photos are grouped in burst_xxx/ subdirectories
help.rule_2_star: ‚≠ê‚≠ê = Either sharpness or aesthetics meets threshold (2 stars)
help.rule_1_star: ‚≠ê = Bird detected but below threshold (1 star)
help.rule_0_star: 0 star = Poor technical quality (confidence/aesthetics/sharpness below threshold or both eyes hidden)
help.ready: Ready? Select a directory to begin!
help.tool_2: Bird Identifier: AI bird species recognition (Mac/Win Lightroom plugin)
help.tool_3: Bird Finder: eBird information retrieval tool (Web beta)
help.tool_4: Star Remover: AI Milky Way star removal (Mac Photoshop plugin)
help.tool_5: Tui Portfolio: iOS bird species statistics app
help.tool_6: Travel Diary: AI travel journal writing assistant (iOS)

lightroom_guide.title: Lightroom Classic User Guide - How to View and Use SuperPicky Ratings
lightroom_guide.method1_step1: Open Lightroom Classic ‚Üí Click 'File' ‚Üí 'Import Photos and Video'
lightroom_guide.method1_step3: Photos will automatically have star ratings and pick flags!
lightroom_guide.method1_step4: ‚ö†Ô∏è Important: After import, select all photos (including subfolders) ‚Üí Menu 'Metadata' ‚Üí 'Read Metadata from Files'
lightroom_guide.method1_step5: Only after the previous step, pick/reject flags will display correctly, otherwise only ratings and color labels show
lightroom_guide.method2_title: Method 2: Re-read Metadata from Already Imported Photos
lightroom_guide.method2_intro: If photos are already in Lightroom, re-read EXIF ratings:
lightroom_guide.method2_step1: Select all processed photos in Library (Cmd+A / Ctrl+A)
lightroom_guide.method2_step3: Confirm ‚Üí Star ratings and pick flags will auto-update!
lightroom_guide.filter_method2_step2: Click 'üèÜPick' flag ‚Üí Show only picked photos
lightroom_guide.sort_step3_city: ‚òë City (Head sharpness value - higher is sharper)
lightroom_guide.sort_step4: Click sort by (e.g., click 'City' to sort by sharpness)
lightroom_guide.field_rating: Rating: -1 star (rejected) / 0 star (poor quality) / 1 star / 2 stars / 3 stars (excellent)
lightroom_guide.field_pick: Pick: üèÜPicked (top 25% in both aesthetics & sharpness among 3-star) / üö´Rejected (-1 star)
lightroom_guide.field_city: City: Head sharpness value, range 0-2000+, higher is sharper
lightroom_guide.field_state: Province-State: Aesthetic score, range 0-10, higher matches human aesthetics better
lightroom_guide.field_caption: Caption: Detailed rating logic explanation, including sharpness, aesthetics, focus status analysis
lightroom_guide.workflow_step1: Step 1: Filter 3-star + picked photos ‚Üí These are the best quality
lightroom_guide.workflow_step2: Step 2: Sort by 'City' descending ‚Üí View sharpest photos
lightroom_guide.debug_tip: In the photo directory's hidden folder .superpicky/debug_crops/, you can find AI analysis diagrams for each photo:
lightroom_guide.debug_explain1: üü¢ Green area = Detected bird body outline (SEG mask)
lightroom_guide.debug_explain3: üî¥ Red cross = Focus point position from RAW file
lightroom_guide.bridge_tip: üí° Simplest: Use Bridge to open different star folders (3Êòü_‰ºòÈÄâ/, 2Êòü_ËâØÂ•Ω/, etc.)

report.title: Processing Statistics Report
report.picked_detail: üèÜ Picked (top in both aesthetics & sharpness): {count} ({percent:.1f}% of 3-star)
report.tip_high_no_bird: üòÖ High percentage of no-bird photos... Consider adjusting shooting angle or using a longer lens
report.tip_no_excellent: üò¢ No excellent photos this time... Don't be discouraged, bird photography requires patience and luck!
report.tip_high_excellent: üéâ Excellent photos exceed 50%! Great shooting quality!
